sentences.sContent: So it appears that banks do an unusually lousy job of differentiating themselves.
sentences.sContent_eng: So it appears that banks do an unusually lousy job of differentiating themselves.
sentences.sCn: 如此看来，银行业者通常在区分自己的工作上太过糟糕。

sentences.sContent: A model may contain hundreds of artifacts, so we might need ways of grouping them or differentiating a few symbols from the others.
sentences.sContent_eng: A model may contain hundreds of artifacts, so we might need ways of grouping them or differentiating a few symbols from the others.
sentences.sCn: 一个模型可能包含了数百个工件，这样我们可能需要将它们分组的方法，或者从其他的符号中进行一些区别。
